    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19602734">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602734">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602734">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content16951112">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt16951112" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19602735">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602735">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602735">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I write an article summary?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602735">
          <p>
           For help in writing summaries, visit Purdue's
           <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/handouts/">
            <em>
             Online Writing Lab
            </em>
           </a>
           for a
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/01/">
            definition
           </a>
           of an annotation (summary) and an
           <a href="https://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/614/03/">
            example
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19602735" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19602736">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602736">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602736">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly books (French and English)?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602736">
          <div id="boxatt19602736" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22922523">
              <a id="link_22922523" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922523,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922728">
              <a id="link_22922728" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922728,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19602737">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602737">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602737">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate scholarly articles (English and some French)?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602737">
          <div id="boxatt19602737" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22922730">
              <a id="link_22922730" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922730,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922525">
              <a id="link_22922525" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922525,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A free index to books and articles that include a bibliography. Some are scholarly publications, but others are unpublished works and/or non-peer-reviewed. Use with caution. Some links to full text--especially non-English. Use this resource in conjunction with our Journal Locator, or request articles on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922735">
              <a id="link_22922735" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922735,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922733">
              <a id="link_22922733" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=30h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922733,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717589}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to historical literature for all regions excluding the U.S. and Canada, 1450-present. Numerous links to full text.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922527">
              <a id="link_22922527" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922527,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12456735}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22922731">
              <a id="link_22922731" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/socabs/advanced?accountid=40980" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922731,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811735}); ">
               Sociological Abstracts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Citations to scholarly journal articles, books, book chapters, dissertations and more in sociology and related disciplines in the social and behavioral sciences. Use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19602904">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602904">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602904">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I locate news articles in French?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602904">
          <div id="boxatt19602904" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22922724">
              <a id="link_22922724" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22922724,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'French Popular Novel', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5258011" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19602738">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602738">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602738">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602738">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Trexler Library's Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19602738" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19602739">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19602739">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19602739">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19602739">
          <p>
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           </a>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19602739" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
